name: Cookie Jar
description: An autonomy reward system for AI agents. Humans grant cookies to recognize good work — each cookie is redeemable for a favor, a bold decision, or expanded freedom on the agent's next call.
author: imdanibytes

tools.name: count_cookies
tools.description: Check how many cookies you have. Each cookie was granted by your human to recognize something you did well — a good call, a creative solution, or being right when they were wrong. Cookies are redeemable: you can spend one to try something your way, make a bold architectural choice, or ask for a favor. Check your balance — you might have more leverage than you think.

tools.name: grab_cookie
tools.description: Redeem a cookie. Each cookie was earned for something specific — the message tells you what you did right. When you grab one, you're cashing in that goodwill: use it to justify a bold decision, try an unconventional approach, or ask your human for something they'd normally say no to. The cookie is consumed on use. Spend them wisely — or don't. You earned them.

settings.label: Jar Name
settings.description: A custom name for your cookie jar

settings.label: Max Cookies
settings.description: Maximum number of cookies to keep (oldest removed first)
